title: DWARVEN INDUSTRY - Battle for Middle Earth 2 Gameplay
description:
Battle for Middle Earth 2 Gameplay - Today we are playing a 6 player FFA at the Dead Marshes.  I am commanding the Dwarves and we are taking on 3 goblin armies, Isengard, and Elves.  The ring is located on the battlefield which makes things interesting :D  Enjoy the Battle!


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
